member.name: T:RGB.NET.Devices.Roccat.RoccatDeviceProvider
member.summary: Represents a device provider responsible for roccat (TalkFX)devices.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.Roccat.RoccatDeviceProvider.PossibleX86NativePaths
member.summary: Gets a modifiable list of paths used to find the native SDK-dlls for x86 applications. The first match will be used.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.Roccat.RoccatDeviceProvider.PossibleX64NativePaths
member.summary: Gets a modifiable list of paths used to find the native SDK-dlls for x64 applications. The first match will be used.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.Roccat.RoccatDeviceProvider.IsInitialized
member.summary: Indicates if the SDK is initialized and ready to use.

member.name: P:RGB.NET.Devices.Roccat.RoccatDeviceProvider.HasExclusiveAccess
member.summary: Gets whether the application has exclusive access to the SDK or not.

member.name: M:RGB.NET.Devices.Roccat.RoccatDeviceProvider.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.exception: Thrown if this constructor is called even if there is already an instance of this class.

member.name: M:RGB.NET.Devices.Roccat.RoccatDeviceProvider.Initialize(RGB.NET.Core.RGBDeviceType,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.exception: Thrown if the SDK is already initialized or if the SDK is not compatible to CUE.

member.name: T:RGB.NET.Devices.Roccat.RoccatDeviceProviderLoader
member.summary: Represents a device provider loaded used to dynamically load roccat devices into an application.
